section.section: As soon as practicable after the end of the fiscal year, the Chairman of the Commission shall submit an annual report to the Governor.

The annual report shall include:
any suggestions to improve the administration of this title;
a detailed statement of receipts and disbursements of the Commission; and
statistical analyses of:
the costs of workers' compensation;
experiences; and
industrial injuries.

text.section: Whenever the Commission determines there is probable cause to believe that, during the immediately preceding 1-year period, there has been an excessive number or a high rate of industrial injuries associated with an employer or industry, the Commission shall report the determination to the Commissioner of Labor and Industry.
